div.p: ANTONIO: Remember, in order to begin changing our behaviors and the choices we make, we have to plan. And an plan of action starts with the 5 key elements that we've been discussing.
ANTONIO: 1, set a date; 2, make a public statement of intent; 3, identify alternatives; 4, plan for obstacles; and 5, identify support.
ANTONIO: If we can make it through this process, we have a pretty good shot at making positive change within our lives.
